abstract: Stocks drift slightly downward in wake of some disappointing quarterly corporate reports.
lead_paragraph: Shares of Verizon and eBay were down after the companies issued disappointing quarterly results.
snippet: Shares of Verizon and eBay were down after the companies issued disappointing quarterly results....

headline.main: Wall St. Ends Lower After Some Middling Quarterly Reports
headline.print_headline: Wall St. Dips After Some Middling Quarterly Reports
